enableShuffleButton.description: Enables the <cj>shuffle button</c> in the main menu
enableShuffleButton.name: Enable shuffle button

enableNotification.description: Shows a notification with the name of the currently playing song.
enableNotification.name: Show notification

notificationTime.description: Modify the time that the notification is on screen
notificationTime.name: Notification time

randomizeWhenExitingLevel.description: Randomize the song when you exit a level
randomizeWhenExitingLevel.name: Randomize on level exit

randomizeWhenExitingEditor.description: Randomize the song when you exit the editor
randomizeWhenExitingEditor.name: Randomize on editor exit

useCustomSongs.description: Use your own songs instead of Newgrounds's (instructions are on the about.md file)
useCustomSongs.name: Use custom songs path
